body: Yeah, I know it sounds a bit silly, but I'm wondering. I'm thinking of getting back onto my first server (I'm not leaving or anything) and believe it or not, hacks are alllowed. No PVP hacks, just small ones like gammabright, x-ray, et cetera. <u>So, I'm wondering if I can have an x-ray texture pack as long as I don't use it on Avicus</u>. If I'm not allowed, I completely understand. Thank you! :3
body_tagged: Yeah, I know it sounds a bit silly, but I'm wondering. I'm thinking of getting back onto my first server (I'm not leaving or anything) and believe it or not, hacks are alllowed. No PVP hacks, just small ones like gammabright, x-ray, et cetera. <u>So, I'm wondering if I can have an x-ray texture pack as long as I don't use it on Avicus</u>. If I'm not allowed, I completely understand. Thank you! :3
title: Un-used x-ray texture pack? (Solved)

replies.body: You're not allowed to use an X-Ray texture pack on Avicus. Doesn't matter if you have one in your texture packs folder, you just cannot use it on Avicus.
replies.body_tagged: You're not allowed to use an X-Ray texture pack on Avicus. Doesn't matter if you have one in your texture packs folder, you just cannot use it on Avicus.

replies.body:
Plus I dont think they work?


Not allowed anyways.
replies.body_tagged:
Plus I dont think they work?


Not allowed anyways.

replies.body: Well think about it, someone is shift tunneling towards the monument and you see them with xray then go for them, is that fair? That's why it isn't allowed.
replies.body_tagged: Well think about it, someone is shift tunneling towards the monument and you see them with xray then go for them, is that fair? That's why it isn't allowed.

Sorry for the confusion xP
